xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/536605-Cliff Richard - the 40th Anniversary Concert 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jbaukTYgxYfxWcOzb3M78RdfBj1.jpg Backed by the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra, Sir Cliff Richard gives a passionate and well-rounded performance to a huge appreciative audience over two nights, in what is a fantastic example of a concert on DVD. Also featured are some "special guests" for some duets and solo performances. Cliff Richard - the 40th Anniversary Concert
